edu.um.optimized_suffix_trie

Class OffsetLengthNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.um.suffix_trie.Node<OffsetLengthKey,OffsetLengthNode>
      • edu.um.optimized_suffix_trie.OffsetLengthNode

  • public class OffsetLengthNode
extends Node<OffsetLengthKey,OffsetLengthNode>
    The Node contains a key OffsetLengthKey which is a pair that contains two integers (offset, length). The value is another OffsetLengthNode.

    • Method Detail

      • buildOptimizedSuffixTrie

        void buildOptimizedSuffixTrie(OptimizedNode head,
                              java.lang.String word)
        Using the Optimisation OptimizedNode, this method will transfer every edge to (offset, length) key using OffsetLengthKey. It will transfer to the new key using String.indexOf on the Suffix word for the offset. This is done for every edge in the Trie.
        Parameters:
        head - The current node.
        word - The word the Trie is built on.

      • offsetLengthToString

        static java.lang.String offsetLengthToString(java.lang.String word,
                                             OffsetLengthKey offsetLengthKey)
        Transfer from OffsetLengthKey to String.
        Parameters:
        word - The word that the Suffix Trie is built on.
        offsetLengthKey - The key to be transferred.
        Returns:
        The String for a key.

      • printTrie

        void printTrie(java.lang.String line,
               boolean isLast,
               OffsetLengthKey key)
        Print part of the Suffix Trie with offset, length.
        Parameters:
        line - Represents a whole line.
        isLast - Checks if it is the last key.
        key - Key to be printed.
